resources.string: "Smart AppLocker won't use any other feature of device admin other than protecting from uninstalling."
Smart AppLocker has been added to device admin.
Smart AppLocker has been removed from device admin.
App Locker service needs new permission on android Lollipop. please enable permisson on the next screen.

"After enable the service, 1. decrease battery usage 50% 2. enable additional features 3. lock service after device reboots will speed up
This service is only used for the above features, we never collect or track any user information."
